00038 #include "MeshTransform.hpp"
00039 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00040 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00041 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00043 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00045   MeshTransform::~MeshTransform() {}
00046   
00050   double MeshTransform::loop_over_mesh( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00051                                         const Settings*,
00052                                         MsqError &err )
00053   {
00054     Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00055 
00056     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> handle_list;
00057     mesh->get_all_vertices( handle_list, err );
00058     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00059       return 1.0;
00060     
00061     std::vector<bool> fixed(1);
00062     MsqVertex vertex;
00063     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator iter;
00064     for (iter = handle_list.begin(); iter != handle_list.end(); ++iter)
00065     {
00066       mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &*iter, &vertex, 1, err );
00067       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00068         return 1.0;
00069       
00070       if (skipFixed) {
00071         mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( &*iter, fixed, 1, err );
00072         if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00073           return 1.0;
00074         if (fixed.front())
00075           continue;
00076       }
00077       
00078       vertex = mMat * vertex + mVec;
00079       
00080       mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( *iter, vertex, err );
00081       if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00082         return 1.0;
00083     }
00084 
00085     return 0.0;
00086   }
00087   
00088   
00089   void MeshTransform::add_translation( const Vector3D& offset )
00090     { mVec += offset; }
00091   
00092   void MeshTransform::add_rotation( const Vector3D& axis, double radians )
00093     {
00094       const double c = cos(radians);
00095       const double s = sin(radians);
00096       const Vector3D a = axis/axis.length();
00097       const Matrix3D m1(    c,   -a[2]*s, a[1]*s,
00098                           a[2]*s,   c,   -a[0]*s,
00099                          -a[1]*s, a[0]*s,   c    );
00100       Matrix3D m2;
00101       m2.outer_product(a,a);
00102       Matrix3D rot = m1 + (1.0 - c) * m2;
00103       mMat = rot * mMat;
00104       mVec = rot * mVec;
00105     }
00106   
00107   void MeshTransform::add_scale( double factor )
00108     { add_scale( Vector3D(factor) ); } 
00109   
00110   void MeshTransform::add_scale( const Vector3D& f )
00111     {
00112       for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00113         mVec[i] *= f[i];
00114         mMat[i][0] *= f[i];
00115         mMat[i][1] *= f[i];
00116         mMat[i][2] *= f[i];
00117       }
00118     }

00121                                         const Settings* ,
00122                                         MsqError&  )
00123     {
00124     }
